channel.title: 2h stance works, but there is this bug... PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Ok so, the 2h Stance works, but when I equip a one handed item, it holds it still as if I am holding the 2h item still. But wheen I unequip any item I am wearing, it changes to how I am suppose to hold the Item I am equipping. Then ill go back to a 2h item and it holds it one handed until I remove any other item im equipping...
Here is a example someone posted on our forums. Thank you to anyone kind enough to help. [img]http://i.imgur.com/4TNaosM.jpg[/img]

Then when you wear a new item set the animation just like it happens with the 2h
